Cyber Claw:







In the dead of the forest, Cyber Claw landed roughly, with a heavy thump of 
her feet. She leaned her aching body, and looked around. She held her head 
in relief that she wasn't dead. Her piercing red eyes check every corner of 
her dark forest, to make sure the two dinosaurs hadn't followed her.

This is bad news, she was found out, and it meant she had to move---again. 
Megatron was probably still hunting her. Didn't that bot ever quit? She was 
just one---but she did serve as a threat. She didn't care about him anymore. 
She wanted to kill him for the abuses he put her against. And when he wanted 
her to destory Dinobot when she was just curious about him. That was the 
downfall of her freedom. Mingling with a Maximal was wrong. And it nearly 
caused her her life.

She transformed to her beast mode. She snarled at her wounds she recived 
from the battle. This was bad. Wounds in the wild while you were alone 
wasn't good. Because here, there were no CR chambers. She wasn't expecting 
the big fight. She just wanted to scare the other raptor away.

Who was she? She couldn't tell. She hadn't the time or temper to ask.

Cyber Claw nosed at the wounds on her side and back. It would heal on its 
own if she allowed it, and took it easy. But things weren't easy if you were 
hunted by your leader.

The giant raptor tilted her head up to the trees and mused to herself. She 
would have to move on within a few cycles---or else die.
